meanings.definition: Causing a strong feeling of dislike or revulsion
meanings.sent1: The smell of rotten eggs is truly disgusting.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left out for days was so disgusting.
meanings.sent3: The way he slurped his soup was absolutely disgusting.
meanings.sent4: The level of pollution in the river was disgusting, like a toxic soup.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the moldy bread was so disgusting that it made me gag.

meanings.sent1: The movie was so disgusting that I had to look away.
meanings.sent2: The taste of the spoiled milk was truly disgusting.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a joke was so bad, it was almost disgusting.
meanings.sent4: The behavior of the bullies was disgusting, like a dark cloud over the school.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the screeching brakes was so disgusting that it made my ears hurt.
